base_description: Gray circular palette with multiple holes.
part_description: One large circular base with twelve smaller circular holes arranged around the edge.
internal_interaction_description: The holes are evenly distributed around the edge of the circular base, allowing for balanced weight distribution. The central position of the clock hands suggests a time-telling function, with the hands pivoting around a central axis.
external_interaction_description: The palette can be held by an artist for mixing paints, with the holes providing grip and convenience. The clock hands indicate time, interacting with viewers by displaying the current hour and minute.
